pr_title: Add listening address for embedded journal

timeline.message: Add external proxy support for GrpcMessagingTransport
Use external proxy infra to pass bind address

timeline.bodyText: Consider creating the GrpcMessagingTransport here? Then we won't have to do as many null checks here and in GrpcMessagingTransport since we can assume the proxy is only set if necessary.
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: I was able to strip some null checks by enforcing valid proxy reference.
replies.author: ggezer
